sentences.chinese: 樗里子者，名疾，秦惠王之弟也，與惠王異母。
sentences.literal: Shu Lizi, whose name was Ji, was King Hui of Qin's younger half-brother.
Their mother was a woman from Han.

sentences.chinese: 樗里子滑稽多智，秦人號曰「智囊」。
sentences.literal: Shu Lizi was witty and highly intelligent. The people of Qin called him the "Wisdom Bag."

sentences.chinese: 秦惠王八年，爵樗里子右更，使將而伐曲沃，盡出其人，取其城，地入秦。
sentences.literal: In the eighth year of King Hui of Qin, he enfeoffed Shu Lizi as Right Minister and sent him as general to attack Quwo. They expelled all its inhabitants, captured the city, and the territory came under Qin control.

sentences.chinese: 秦惠王二十五年，使樗里子為將伐趙，虜趙將軍莊豹，拔藺。
sentences.literal: In the twenty-fifth year of King Hui of Qin, he sent Shu Lizi as general to attack Zhao. They captured the Zhao general Zhuang Bao and took the city of Lin.

sentences.chinese: 明年，助魏章攻楚，敗楚將屈丐，取漢中地。
sentences.literal: The next year, he assisted Wei Zhang in attacking Chu, defeated the Chu general Qu Gai, and took the territory of Hanzhong.
Qin enfeoffed Shu Lizi and gave him the title Lord Yan.

sentences.chinese: 秦惠王卒，太子武王立，逐張儀、魏章，而以樗里子、甘茂為左右丞相。
sentences.literal: When King Hui of Qin died, Crown Prince Wu ascended the throne as King Wu. He expelled Zhang Yi and Wei Zhang, and appointed Shu Lizi and Gan Mao as left and right chancellors.
Qin sent Gan Mao to attack Han and capture Yiyang.

sentences.chinese: 使樗里子以車百乘入周。
sentences.literal: They sent Shu Lizi with a hundred chariots to enter Zhou.
Zhou welcomed him with troops, showing great respect.

sentences.chinese: 楚王怒，讓周，以其重秦客。
sentences.literal: The King of Chu was angry and rebuked Zhou for favoring the Qin guest.

sentences.chinese: 齊桓公伐蔡，號曰誅楚，其實襲蔡。
sentences.literal: When Duke Huan of Qi attacked Cai, he announced it was to punish Chu, but actually attacked Cai.
